Class Elevator

java.lang.Object
Elevator
Record Components:
currentFloor - - Represents the current floor that the elevator is on
destFloor - - The destination floor of the elevator
destFloors - - The destination floors of the elevator when more than 1 passenger is boarded
hasRequest - - To check if there is a request or not for the elevator
nextCarNum - - Static variable used to assign id's to the elevator
carNum - - The elevator id number
passengerFloor - - The floor of the passenger
time - - Amount of time the elevator should sleep for to simulate movement, doors opening, and passengers boarding/disembarking
receivedPassengers - - Whether passengers have boarded the elevator
elevatorRequest - - the shared memory between the elevator and scheduler.
eleSocket - - The datagram socket of the elevator
sendPacket - - The datagram packet that is being sent
receivePacket - - The datagram packet that is being received
localAddr - - InetAddress
doorClosed - - When door is open or closed
state - - The state of the elevator
portid - - The port id of the elevator
hasFaulted - - A boolean value to identify if the elevator has faulted or not
isOn - - A boolean value to identify if the elevator is running
doorDelay - - The delay of the door
floorDelay - - The delay of the floor
faultNum - - The number of occurrences before the fault occurs
faultType - - The type of fault of the elevator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Elevator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
